err, 2500.

On Sat, May 6, 2017 at 2:43 PM, Eugene Brevdo ***@***.***> wrote: Got it. Did you expect to have a batch_size of 2000? It seems like the batch_size variable you passed to cell.zero_state was 2000. On Sat, May 6, 2017 at 2:41 PM, Kevin Shaw ***@***.***> wrote: > @ebrevdo <https://github.com/ebrevdo> : Thanks for replying. > initial_state is shown at the top of the original post here. > Reprinting: > > (LSTMStateTuple(c=<tf.Tensor 'RNN/MultiRNNCellZeroState/BasicLSTMCellZeroState/zeros:0' shape=(2500, 75) dtype=float32>, h=<tf.Tensor 'RNN/MultiRNNCellZeroState/BasicLSTMCellZeroState/zeros_1:0' shape=(2500, 75) dtype=float32>), LSTMStateTuple(c=<tf.Tensor 'RNN/MultiRNNCellZeroState/BasicLSTMCellZeroState_1/zeros:0' shape=(2500, 75) dtype=float32>, h=<tf.Tensor 'RNN/MultiRNNCellZeroState/BasicLSTMCellZeroState_1/zeros_1:0' shape=(2500, 75) dtype=float32>)) > > — > You are receiving this because you were mentioned. > Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub > <#9699 (comment)>, > or mute the thread > <https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/ABtim9J4HA-AJhl66gzWTr1Lscy2RvOWks5r3OkQgaJpZM4NSS3U> > . >
body_text:
err, 2500.
…
On Sat, May 6, 2017 at 2:43 PM, Eugene Brevdo ***@***.***> wrote:
 Got it.  Did you expect to have a batch_size of 2000?  It seems like the
 batch_size variable you passed to cell.zero_state was 2000.

 On Sat, May 6, 2017 at 2:41 PM, Kevin Shaw ***@***.***>
 wrote:

> @ebrevdo <https://github.com/ebrevdo> : Thanks for replying.
> initial_state is shown at the top of the original post here.
> Reprinting:
>
> (LSTMStateTuple(c=<tf.Tensor 'RNN/MultiRNNCellZeroState/BasicLSTMCellZeroState/zeros:0' shape=(2500, 75) dtype=float32>, h=<tf.Tensor 'RNN/MultiRNNCellZeroState/BasicLSTMCellZeroState/zeros_1:0' shape=(2500, 75) dtype=float32>), LSTMStateTuple(c=<tf.Tensor 'RNN/MultiRNNCellZeroState/BasicLSTMCellZeroState_1/zeros:0' shape=(2500, 75) dtype=float32>, h=<tf.Tensor 'RNN/MultiRNNCellZeroState/BasicLSTMCellZeroState_1/zeros_1:0' shape=(2500, 75) dtype=float32>))
>

body:
err, 2500.

On Sat, May 6, 2017 at 2:43 PM, Eugene Brevdo <ebrevdo@google.com> wrote:

> Got it.  Did you expect to have a batch_size of 2000?  It seems like the
> batch_size variable you passed to cell.zero_state was 2000.
>
> On Sat, May 6, 2017 at 2:41 PM, Kevin Shaw <notifications@github.com>
> wrote:
>
>> @ebrevdo <https://github.com/ebrevdo> : Thanks for replying.
>> initial_state is shown at the top of the original post here.
>> Reprinting:
>>
